metadata.title: CVE-2022-24975 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The --mirror documentation for Git through 2.35.1 does notmention the availability of deleted content, aka the "GitBleed" issue. Thiscould present a security risk if information-disclosure auditing processesrely on a clone operation without the --mirror option. Note: This has beendisputed by multiple 3rd parties who believe this is an intended feature ofthe git binary and does not pose a security risk.

criterions.comment: git: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'documentation patch only').
